properties.description:
This invokes 4 other pipelines.
1. Ingest Data from ADLS blob locations to Snowflake Stage tables. 
2. Transform the data from Snowflake Stage Tables and load to the final base tables.
3. To check the presence of dependent triggers.
4. To delete the triggers after processing.

activities.name: SP-ActivityFailed03
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Until-TriggerFound activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess03
activities.description: This activity logs success of EP-DBT_Processing activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-ActivityFailed01
activities.description: This activity logs failure of LU-Metadata activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: Until-TriggerFound
activities.description: This activity will invoked EP-UntilTriggerFound which will wait and search for the presence of dependent triggers.

activities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess02
activities.description: This activity logs success of IF_Dependent_Trigger_Exists activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: LU-Metadata
activities.description: This activity pulls the details related to application_name and blob_trigger_name from orchestration_metadata.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from khc_orchestration_metadata where application_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}' and SUBSTRING(concat('/',blob_trigger_name), LEN(concat('/',blob_trigger_name)) - CHARINDEX('/',REVERSE(concat('/',blob_trigger_name))) + 2, LEN(concat('/',blob_trigger_name)))= '@{pipeline().parameters.BlobTriggerName}' and active_ind = 'y'

activities.name: SP-PipelineStart
activities.description: This Activity logs starting of pipeline in khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess05
activities.description: This activity logs success of EP-DBT_Processing activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: Copy_To_SAP
activities.description: This activity copies data into SAP System

activities.name: GM-Metadata
activities.description: This activity pulls the details of the snowflake table and blob location from khc_enggextract_metadata table which needs to extracted.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from khc_enggextract_metadata where application_name= '@{activity('LU-Metadata').output.value[0].application_name}' and dataset_group = '@{activity('LU-Metadata').output.value[0].dataset_group}' and active_ind = 'y'

activities.name: SP-ActivityFailed04
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Metadata Lookup activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Pipelinesuccesful
activities.description: This Activity logs completion of pipeline in khc_audit_log table.
